items.sentence: Their homes don't have electricity or running water.
My cat likes it when we scratch him behind the ears.
My arm has been troubling me ever since my accident.
My grandfather has a piece of shrapnel in his chest.
Nowadays it's possible to watch soccer games online.
I can't believe that Tom and Mary are still married.
How much more time do I have to complete doing this?
Tom was worried that something might happen to Mary.
I asked Tom why he didn't try doing that by himself.
Do you think Tom would sell me one of his paintings?
